channel.title: --Switch-Blade Developement Team--
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]Im looking for trustworthly People for Switch-Blade Pk, And Non-Pk Team Name:Switch-Blade.[/glow]
[b]Contacting Me/Mladen/Switch-Blade:[/b] Email: Mladens.Awesome@hotmail.com Msn: Mladens.Awesome@hotmail.com
[size=18pt][font=Verdana]Join Forums!!![/font][/size] Forums: http://z8.invisionfree.com/NewServer
[b]How to Join the team?[/b] Requirements:
[ul][li][b]For Coders Only[/b][/li] [li]Know how to add commands[/li] [li]Know how to add voids[/li] [li]Know where to add them[/li] [li]Must have General java coding knowledge[/li] [li]Must be patient[/li] [li]Must be a Owner,Co- Owner or Admins of any server OR slightly better coder than me[/ul]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Joining As Mods, Advertisers, Testers?[/b] Requirements:
[ul][li][b]Forum Mods, Server Advertisers, And Testers[/b][/li] [li]You must have past-time experience[/li] [li]You must know what your Testing[/li] [li]You have to be Patient[/li] [li]Need to be respectfull towards others[/li] [li]I would not like if you join to leave and make your own team![/li][/ul]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Application Form:[/b] Forum Name: MSN/Email: Coding Level: 1-10 /10 Experience? Can you be online at least 1-2 times a week? Why should we pick you? Coding Knowledge?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Current Team:[/b]
[b]Owner:[/b] Mladen aka Switch Blade
[b]Co Owner:[/b] Hootnnuts
[b]MainCoder:[/b] Open Open Open [b]Coders:[/b] Nets8 Open Open Open Open Open Open Open Open
[b]Advertisers:[/b] Open Open Open Open Open Open
[b]Forum Mods:[/b] Open Open Open
[b]Server Testers:[/b] Zezuma Open Open Open[br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 05:59:47 PM[/size][hr]Cmonnn i know theres tons of coders there![br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 06:24:13 PM[/size][hr]Please join?

item.title: --Switch-Blade Developement Team--
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Forum Name: Nets8
MSN/Email: nets068@hotmail.com
Coding Level: Advanced
Experience?: I have been coding for about two years.
Can you be online at least 1-2 times a week?: More than that.
Why should we pick you?: You should pick me because I know to to code and I am experienced at the area of server management.
Coding Knowledge?: I have been coding for about two years.

NOTE : If you accept me, please make a spot in the developer list for me because I’m not sure if I should shut down the development team I have created. My decision will depend on how this team is going (coders, quantity of coders, etc.).

Thanks,
~Nets
